title: David Beckham 'smashes tooth snowboarding' just days after son Brooklyn breaks collarbone - Mirror Online
text:

Days after Brooklyn Beckham broke his collarbone on the family ski trip, dad David also had an accident of his own. 
The former footballer reportedly smashed his tooth while snowboarding and needed an emergency visit to the dentist when he landed back in London from Whistler, Canada. 
Just hours after getting back to the UK, David, 41, is said to have had his damaged incisor fixed. 
The dad-of-four, who wasn't allowed to do any winter sports while playing football, was trying out snowboarding for first time as he took to the slopes with Romeo, Cruz, Brookly, Harper and wife Victoria. 
“David is a trooper and didn’t make a fuss. He took it all in his stride," a source told The Sun . The Beckham Family hit the slopes for a day of Skiing in Whistler British Columbia (Photo: TheImageDirect/Splash News) The Beckham Family hit the slopes for a day of Skiing in Whistler British Columbia (Photo: TheImageDirect/Splash News) 
Brooklyn also took a nasty fall during the trip, breaking his collarbone days earlier. 
The aspiring photographer was filming as he glided down the slopes, but footage came to a sudden stop when he fell to the ground. Beckham family Skiing (Photo: VictoriaBeckham/Instagram) Beckham family Skiing (Photo: VictoriaBeckham/Instagram) 
David shared a picture of his son on the slopes before the painful incident - but insisted he was "brave". Read More The Beckham family skiing (Photo: Instagram) Brooklyn Beckham (Photo: PA) 
He captioned it: "Just before his accident... Brave boy xx sorry ( man ) (sic)" 
During their trip, the former footballer shared a number of pictures on social media and admitted he doesn't normally post so much. 
He added: "Don't usually post so many but it's so beautiful up here plus having a special time so before anyone else sells pictures of the family I wanted you guys to see them first." 
Mirror Celebs has contacted a spokesperson for David for comment. Like us on Facebook
